cards.name: Push Attack
cards.description: Push opponent to within 2 tile, then attack

cards.name: Pull Attack
cards.description: Pull opponent within 2 tile, then attack

cards.name: Block Attack
cards.description:
Start: block opponent movement with in 3 tile.
Attack

cards.name: Sword Strike
cards.description:
Start: if have buff, move 0-1
 If attack land, gain empower ( +1 ATK, +1 DEF )

cards.name: Bash Strike
cards.description:
Start: if have buff, move 0-1
 After: Push opponent away 0-9

cards.name: Blood Sacrifice
cards.description: Start: Pay 30% health and gain equivalent amount of attack. If have buff, move 0-1

cards.name: Ground Defense
cards.description:
Start: if have buff, move 0-1
 After: move 0-2

cards.name: Empower
cards.description:
Start: if have buff, move 0-1
 gain empower buff (+1 ATK, +1 DEF)

cards.name: Kite Attack
cards.description:
Start: move 0-2
move 0-2, then attack
After: move 0-2

cards.name: Arrow shower
cards.description: If attack land, apply range debuff

cards.name: Sabotage
cards.description: if attack land, apply confuse debuff( opponent randomly attack and move )

cards.name: Meteor
cards.description: If attack land, apply fire debuff( -1 health for 3 turns )

cards.name: Fire Trap
cards.description: set a trap on a field. Enemy cannot move pass a trap. When enemy trigger a trap, it will receive damage and fire debuff.

cards.name: You Shall Not Pass
cards.description: Apply stop movement debuff( opponent cannot move for 3 turns )

cards.name: Ghostblaster
cards.description: summon a ghost, ghost will attack enemy nearby. when ghost make contact with enemy, it will deal 1 damage before disaapearing
